statements: SELECT claim_number, date_of_accident, claim_status FROM claims;
SELECT claim_number, claim_status, date_of_accident FROM claims;
SELECT date_of_accident, claim_status, claim_number FROM claims;
SELECT claim_status, date_of_accident, claim_number FROM claims;
SELECT * FROM claims;
SELECT * FROM claims WHERE claim_status='Pending' ORDER BY date_of_accident DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT claim_number, date_of_accident FROM claims WHERE date_of_accident BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT claim_number, claim_status FROM claims WHERE claim_status='Approved' ORDER BY claim_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM claims WHERE claim_status IN ('Pending','Denied') ORDER BY claim_number DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT claim_number, count(*) AS num_claims FROM claims GROUP BY claim_number HAVING num_claims > 1 ORDER BY num_claims DESC;
SELECT * FROM claims;
SELECT claim_number, date_of_accident, claim_status FROM claims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT customer_name, insurance_company, claim_amount FROM claim_details WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM claim_details WHERE insurance_company = 'ABC Insurance';
SELECT claim_number, customer_name, claim_amount FROM claim_details ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM claims JOIN claim_details ON claims.claim_number = claim_details.claim_number WHERE claims.claim_status = 'Open'
SELECT claim_number, date_of_accident, insurance_company FROM claims JOIN claim_details ON claims.claim_number = claim_details.claim_number WHERE claim_details.claim_amount > 5000
SELECT claim_number, customer_name, claim_amount FROM claim_details WHERE insurance_company = 'ABC Insurance' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC
SELECT MAX(claim_amount) AS max_claim_amount FROM claim_details WHERE claim_amount > 10000
SELECT claim_number, date_of_accident, claim_status FROM claims WHERE date_of_accident BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM Claims;
SELECT claim_number, date_of_accident FROM Claims ORDER BY date_of_accident DESC;
SELECT claimant_name, claimant_address FROM Claimants WHERE claimant_id = 1;
SELECT claim_type_name FROM ClaimTypes WHERE claim_type_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Claims JOIN Claimants ON Claims.claim_number = Claimants.claimant_id;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE claim_status = 'Pending';
SELECT claim_number, date_of_accident FROM Claims WHERE date_of_accident BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Claimants ORDER BY claimant_name DESC;
SELECT claim_type_name, COUNT(*) AS num_claims FROM Claims INNER JOIN ClaimTypes ON Claims.claim_number = ClaimTypes.claim_type_id GROUP BY claim_type_name;
SELECT claimant_name, claim_number FROM Claimants INNER JOIN Claims ON Claimants.claimant_id = Claims.claim_number WHERE Claims.claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM Claims;
SELECT claim_number, date_of_accident FROM Claims ORDER BY date_of_accident DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE policy_type = 'Homeowners';
SELECT adjuster_name, adjuster_phone FROM Adjusters ORDER BY adjuster_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE date_of_accident = '2022-01-15';
SELECT claim_number, claim_status FROM Claims WHERE claim_status = 'Pending';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT adjuster_name, adjuster_phone FROM Adjusters WHERE adjuster_id = 201;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, policy_coverage FROM Policies WHERE policy_type = 'Health';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT policy_type, coverage_amount FROM Policies WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT claim_number, date_of_accident, claim_status FROM Claims ORDER BY date_of_accident DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT claimant_name, claimant_address FROM Claimants;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT policy_type, coverage_amount FROM Policies WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT date_of_accident, claim_status FROM Claims WHERE claim_status = 'Pending';
